com.envibe.envibe.service

Class NewsFeedUpdateService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.envibe.envibe.service.NewsFeedUpdateService

  • @Service
public class NewsFeedUpdateService
extends Object
    Handles background updating of friend's news feed when a user creates a post or an event triggers an update on a user's activity. All actions run in the background on the same server that called the service. Trust me, RabbitMQ is not worth it on this project.
    Author:
    ARMmaster17
    See Also:
    NewsFeedUpdateWorker

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) CachedItemDao cachedItemDao
      Injected data access object for CachedItems in the temporary datastore.
      private ArrayList<Thread> workers
      Local pool of workers so that we can invoke their control functions if needed.

public void dismantle()
